examples.name: Default
examples.code: <rux-notification open="" status="standby" message="This is a notification banner. It won’t disappear until the user dismisses it."></rux-notification>

examples.name: Default Slot
examples.code: Notification banner Link

examples.name: Prefix Slot
examples.code:
<rux-notification open="" status="standby" message="This is a notification banner. It won’t disappear until the user dismisses it.">
	<rux-classification-marking classification="unclassified" tag="" slot="prefix"></rux-classification-marking>
	Notification banner
</rux-notification>

examples.name: Actions Slot
examples.code:
<rux-notification open="" status="standby" message="This is a notification banner. It won’t disappear until the user dismisses it.">
	Notification banner
	<rux-button slot="actions">Acknowledge</rux-button>
</rux-notification>

fields.value: This is a notification banner. It won’t disappear until the user dismisses it.

fields.note: Prevents the user from dismissing the notification

examples.name: Default
examples.code: This pop up is activated when a user clicks on the associated icon.

examples.name: With Menu
examples.code:
<rux-pop-up open="true" placement="bottom-end" enable-animation-frame>
	<rux-icon icon="apps" slot="trigger"></rux-icon>
	<rux-menu>
		<rux-menu-item href="#">Menu Item 1</rux-menu-item>
		<rux-menu-item href="#">Menu Item 2</rux-menu-item>
		<rux-menu-item-divider></rux-menu-item-divider>
		<rux-menu-item href="#">Menu Item 3</rux-menu-item>
	</rux-menu>
</rux-pop-up>

records.style: rux-pop-up{position: absolute;} rux-pop-up::part(popup-content){width:200px;} p{padding-inline: 10px;} a-sandbox::part(content) { position: relative; }

examples.name: Default
examples.code:
<rux-select label="Select Menu" input-id="1" label-id="1" name="default" size="small">
	<rux-option value="" selected="" label="Select an option"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.1" label="Option 1.1"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.2" label="Option 1.2"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.3" label="Option 1.3"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.4" disabled="" label="Option 1.4 (disabled)"></rux-option>
</rux-select>

examples.name: Option Group
examples.code:
<rux-select label="With option groups" input-id="1" label-id="1" name="default" size="small">
	<rux-option value="" label="Select an option" selected=""></rux-option>
	<rux-option-group label="Group one">
		<rux-option value="1.1" label="Option 1.1"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="1.2" label="Option 1.2"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="1.3" label="Option 1.3"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="1.4" label="Option 1.4"></rux-option>
	</rux-option-group>
	<rux-option-group label="Group two">
		<rux-option value="2.1" label="Option 2.1"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="2.2" label="Option 2.2"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="2.3" label="Option 2.3"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="2.4" disabled="" label="Option 2.4 (disabled)"></rux-option>
	</rux-option-group>
	<rux-option value="3.1" label="Option 3.1"></rux-option>
</rux-select>

examples.name: Multiple
examples.code:
<rux-select multiple label="Multi Select" input-id="1" label-id="1" name="default" size="small">
	<rux-option value="" label="Select an option" selected=""></rux-option>
	<rux-option-group label="Group one">
		<rux-option value="1.1" label="Option 1.1"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="1.2" label="Option 1.2"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="1.3" label="Option 1.3"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="1.4" label="Option 1.4"></rux-option>
	</rux-option-group>
	<rux-option-group label="Group two">
		<rux-option value="2.1" label="Option 2.1"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="2.2" label="Option 2.2"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="2.3" label="Option 2.3"></rux-option>
		<rux-option value="2.4" disabled="" label="Option 2.4 (disabled)"></rux-option>
	</rux-option-group>
	<rux-option value="3.1" label="Option 3.1"></rux-option>
</rux-select>

examples.name: Inline
examples.code:
<rux-select label="Inline Select Menu" input-id="1" label-id="1" name="default" size="small" inline>
	<rux-option value="" selected="" label="Select an option"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.1" label="Option 1.1"></rux-option>

	<rux-option value="1.3" label="Option 1.3"></rux-option>

</rux-select>

examples.name: Default
examples.code:
<rux-tree>
	<rux-tree-node expanded selected>
		Tree item 1
		<rux-tree-node expanded slot="node">
			Tree item 1.1
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.1.1</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.1.2</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.1.3</rux-tree-node>
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.2</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			Tree item 1.3
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">
				Tree item 1.3.1
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.1.1</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.1.2</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.1.3</rux-tree-node>
			</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">
				Tree item 1.3.2
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.2.1</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.2.2</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.2.3</rux-tree-node>
			</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">
				Tree item 1.3.3
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.3.1</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.3.2</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.3.3.3</rux-tree-node>
			</rux-tree-node>
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			Tree item 1.4 
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.4.1</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.4.2</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.4.3</rux-tree-node>
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 1.5</rux-tree-node>
	</rux-tree-node>
	<rux-tree-node>
		Tree item 2
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 2.1</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 2.2 </rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">Tree item 2.3 </rux-tree-node>
	</rux-tree-node>
	<rux-tree-node>Tree item 3 </rux-tree-node>
</rux-tree>

examples.name: Status
examples.code:
<rux-tree>
	<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot="prefix" status="normal"></rux-status>
		Tree item 1
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			<rux-status slot="prefix" status="normal"></rux-status>
			Tree item 1.1
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			<rux-status slot="prefix" status="normal"></rux-status>
			Tree item 1.2
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			<rux-status slot="prefix" status="normal"></rux-status>
			Tree item 1.3
		</rux-tree-node>
	</rux-tree-node>
	<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot="prefix" status="standby"></rux-status>
		Tree item 2
	</rux-tree-node>
	<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot="prefix" status="normal"></rux-status>
		Tree item 3
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			<rux-status slot="prefix" status="off"></rux-status>
			Tree item 3.1
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			<rux-status slot="prefix" status="critical"></rux-status>
			Tree item 3.2
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
				<rux-status slot="prefix" status="normal"></rux-status>
			Tree item 3.3
		</rux-tree-node>
	</rux-tree-node>
	<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot="prefix" status="caution"></rux-status>
		Tree item 4
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			<rux-status slot="prefix" status="caution"></rux-status>
				Tree item 4.1
		</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node slot="node">
			<rux-status slot="prefix" status="normal"></rux-status>
				Tree item 4.2
		</rux-tree-node>
	</rux-tree-node>
</rux-tree>
